column5: Student must have at least 120 total credits to graduate
Student should have at least 60 core credits (sum of core category credits)
At least 2 lab credits (Bio or Chem lab courses)
At least 2 credits across the interprofessional education sequence (e.g., IPE 4200 & IPE 4900)
At least 6 credits of upper-division electives
Students beginning in Fall 2025 are limited to 9 transfer credits toward their SLU degree once enrolled
Complete the Cura Personalis 1 course (CORE 1500) within the first 36 earned credits to stay on track with the Core sequence
